attributes.action: Make MPs act respectfully for PMQs just as children are expected to in school.
attributes.background: Prime Ministers Questions seems to have been reduced to scenes of utter contempt for elected officials.  In schools we teach children to behave by putting their hands up to speak and to respect the person speaking. We the electorate expect no less from the people we entrusted to speak on our behalf.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. It is clear you care about the conduct and behaviour of MPs during Prime Ministers Questions. You could start a petition calling for a specific action or reform to ensure that MPs act respectfully in the Chamber.
